ignore.name: ignore
ignore.description: List of glob paths to **not** compile. (comma separated)

include.name: include
include.description: List of extensions to compile. (comma separated)

out-extension.name: out-extension
out-extension.description: Customize the file extension of the files that esbuild generates to something other than .js or .css. This option is useful if you are using esbuild to generate multiple files and you have to use the outdir option instead of the outfile option [link](https://esbuild.github.io/api/#out-extension)

delete-dir-on-start.name: delete-dir-on-start
delete-dir-on-start.description: Delete the out directory before compilation

args.name: src
args.description: Source directory to run build on

ignore.name: ignore
ignore.description: List of glob paths to **not** rename. (comma separated)

format.name: format
format.description: Format the final output after any replacements

sequential.name: sequential
sequential.description: Append numbers to the end of the file name after any replacements

replace.name: replace
replace.description: Replace a string in the file name.

args.name: src
args.description: List of glob path(s) to rename

icons:convert.description: Convert svg icons to icon font, generate typescript types and write to disk

fontName.name: fontName
fontName.description: The font family name of the generated font

fontHeight.name: fontHeight
fontHeight.description: The font height of the generated font

startUnicode.name: startUnicode
startUnicode.description: The start unicode of the generated font

normalize.name: normalize
normalize.description: Normalize icons by scaling them to the height of the highest icon.

skip-types.name: skip-types
skip-types.description: Generate Typescript types for the icons

args.name: src
args.description: List of glob paths to convert (comma separated)
